"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548ce58663687274c5390100#post_548ce58663687274c5390100
I remember one time my cousin and I got into a fight at my grandma's place. And I mean a full-on FIGHT. And we somehow managed to punch a hole in her wall. When she got back and saw the hole in her wall she looked at the two of us and her fisrt sentence was "Well who won." Which was immediately followed by "You two idiots better fix this." My family is awesome.
